ComicInfo.Summary:
Edwin is a bad precog.
Mugging victim falls for Dredd. "She would always remember his first words. Stern -- yet somehow warm and kindly: 'What the HELL are you doin' out alone on this patch of ground, Citizen? You _crazy_?' "
